Package hu.bme.mit.theta.sts.aiger.elements

package hu.bme.mit.theta.sts.aiger.elements
This package contains our itnernal AIGER system representation.
See Also:

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    hu.bme.mit.theta.sts.aiger
    This package contains the AIGER (Hardware Model Checking Competition) frontend for STSs.
    hu.bme.mit.theta.sts.aiger.utils
    This package contains utilities for AIGER systems such as visualization and optimizations.
